summary.Title: Carpet Cleaner, Sande i Vestfold, Norway
summary.JobHeadline: Carpet Cleaner, Sande i Vestfold, Norway

JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: Carpet Cleaner, Sande i Vestfold, Norway
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
CC Tekstilservice AS, Sande i Vestfold, Norway, is seeking a Carpet Cleaner for our main branch in Sande.

Responsibilities:
  • Full responsibility for our carpet department.
  • Measuring carpets with machines.
  • Stain treatment.
  • Manual and machine-based carpet washing.
  • Preparing carpets for final delivery.
  • Packing carpets for branch distribution.
  • Quality assurance of deliveries from the department.


Preferred qualifications:
  • Energetic and positive attitude.
  • Reliable, punctual, and detail-oriented.
  • Physically fit, as the job can be physically demanding at times.
  • Able to handle high-pressure situations during peak seasons.
  • Very good level of Norwegian or English with good communication skills.
  • A good sense of humour and a strong work ethic.
  • Responsible, structured, and quick to learn routines.


Experience in carpet cleaneing or production work is advantageous but not required.

We offer:
  • Opportunities for individuals willing to give their best.
  • Full training and support during the onboarding period.
  • Occupational health services.
  • Friendly and dedicated colleagues.
  • A challenging and independent role within a stable company.
  • Competitive salary.
  • Comfortable employee accommodations.
  • Permanent position.


Sustainability commitment:
  • The company is environmentally certified.
  • Eco-Lighthouse certified.
  • Green Point approved.
  • 100% hydropower electricity.
  • Self-sufficient in electricity through solar panels.


Working hours:

  • daytime, weekdays and Saturdays.


Starting date:
  • 03.03.2025 or to be agreed upon


Salary:
  • gross starting salary is NOK 505.000 annually


Other information:
  • Accommodation option near the workplace in Sande. We offer accommodation the first six months. NOK 8.500 monthly. Flat with two bedrooms, livingroom, kitchen and bathroom. Separate entrance.
  • All our working contracts are prepared in close dialogue with the Employers Organisation Virke


More information:

Michael Hansen, +47 4020 8873, CV@cctekstilservice.no

How to apply?

CV and application should be sent to CV@CCTEKSTIL.NO

Latest application date is 28.02.2025

Applications are assessed continuously, and recruitment may occur before the application deadline if the right candidate is found. We encourage you to submit your application/CV as soon as possible.

(from NAV EURES Norway)



Shape the Future of Carpet Cleaning with CC Tekstilservice: Your Career, Your Guidance.
CC Tekstilservice AS is a leading provider of textile services in Vestfold, catering to businesses of all sizes. The company employs 30 people and generates over 25 million NOK in annual revenue. Our primary clients are in the healthcare, hotel, and industrial sectors, relying on us for textile rental services. We are known for our expertise in textiles and maintain strong relationships with satisfied customers from Oslo to Skien.

As CC Tekstilservice experiences significant growth, we are looking for a new team member to strengthen our organization. We are seeking a team player ready to take on diverse tasks and responsibilities. After training, you should be prepared to take ownership of your assigned route.

www.cctekstil.no
